needs: Ola seeks to enhance recruitment outcomes by improving diversity and reducing cost-per-hire through data-driven methods and measurement. They aim to clarify goals and constraints early, run small experiments to validate approaches, and establish efficient, transparent processes that support sustainable cross-functional alignment and continuous improvement while managing part-time capacity.
personality: Ola has a direct, transparent communication style grounded in data and pragmatic execution. They value clear accountability, simplicity, and humane processes. Their collaborative approach involves documenting decisions, maintaining lightweight artifacts, surfacing unknowns early, and fostering alignment through concise updates. They prioritize evidence and learning, guiding iteration with honest error budgets and measurable signals.
